definition: a period of time/phase/stage/classifier for issues of a periodical, courses of study/time/term/period/to hope/Taiwan pr. [qi2]

sentences.english: The Restoration is an important transformable age in the history of finance and taxation in England .
sentences.chinese: 復辟時期是英國財政與稅收史上的一個重要轉型時代。

sentences.english: It also reflects the pantheistic experimentation of the period immediately following the Civil War.
sentences.chinese: 同時也反映出了泛神論時期緊跟的內戰時期狀態。

sentences.english: It also reflects the pantheistic experimentation of the period immediately following the Civil War.
sentences.chinese: 同時也反映出了泛神論時期緊跟的內戰時期狀態。

sentences.english: The biggest accumulating rate occurred around the heading period with a one-peak curve.
sentences.chinese: 增長速率最快時期在抽穗前後，呈單峯型曲線。

sentences.english: The first part narrates Shang and Zhou period personalities do not stand independently.
sentences.chinese: 第一部分講述商周時期人格的不獨立。

sentences.english: The testing of FL has witnessed two periods of development: that of code-based testing first and then that of structure-based testing.
sentences.chinese: 外語測試經歷了以語碼爲綱和以結構爲綱的兩個時期。

sentences.english: The Qing Dynasty is the Anhui local chronicle development prosperous time.
sentences.chinese: 清代是安徽方誌發展的鼎盛時期。

sentences.english: Legend has it that there was a devil in Dynasty of Dong Han.
sentences.chinese: 相傳，在東漢時期有一妖怪爲禍人間。

sentences.english: This is a new era in Gulf politics and security.
sentences.chinese: 這是海灣地區政治和安全的新時期。

sentences.english: There was a time when every moment was infused with hope and wonder.
sentences.chinese: 生命中曾有段時期充滿著希望和驚喜。

sentences.english: Shu Bote living in classicism and romanticism of the transition period.
sentences.chinese: 舒柏特生活在古典主義和浪漫主義的交接時期。

sentences.english: Thus in this period, the subject concerning two-party system and party competes becomes hot point.
sentences.chinese: 因而這一時期有關兩黨制和黨爭的話題成爲言論熱點。

sentences.english: Chinese Opera was formed in the Song and Yuan Dynasties.
sentences.chinese: 中國戲曲形成於宋元時期。

sentences.english: During the war, our army often used letters attached with a chicken feather to deliver important messages.
sentences.chinese: 戰爭時期我軍經常用雞毛信傳遞重要信息。

sentences.english: He also puts forward some countermeasures for China coal industry in heavy chemical industry period.
sentences.chinese: 提出了重化工業時期我國煤炭工業應採取的對策。

sentences.english: So how can we not be concerned about the reserves during the transition period?
sentences.chinese: 過渡時期我們不過問儲備金行嗎？

definition: in those days/then/in those years/during that time
to create/to produce/to write/creative work/creation/CL:個|个[ge4]
one's conduct/deed/activity/accomplishment/achievement/to act as/as (in the capacity of)/qua/to view as/to look upon (sth as)/to take sth to be

local/regional/district (not necessarily formal administrative unit)/region/area/as suffix to city name, means prefecture or county (area administered by a prefecture-level city or county level city)/CL:個|个[ge4]
